ygData.messageBody:
It was mentioned that the exploit was most likely a bug with charm and memblur. If you charmed something, had it attack somethin else, then feigned death (as a necro) and/or memblurred, the mob would continue to fight the other mob as that would then be the only thing on the charmed mob's hate list. Notice that this has absolutely nothing to do with bards. Notice that this is becoming the norm for Verant. "didn't realize the effect it would have". kthx~

Llaenie, 45th bard, Tunare
Ueni, 55th blackguard, Tunare
----- Original Message -----
From: Bill Costlow
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, May 13, 2001 5:46 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm Change



I think the exploit MIGHT be that you can use short duration charm to simply soften up two mobs and then kill both for full xp. Seems to me a poor exploit tho, especially since we pay for a 39th lvl charm with mana and that charm has no enhancements over song of sirens and the only benefit is that, we can continue to do something we've been doing for 12 lvls...
